item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m Arnab Chakraborty. I love programming (and have been programming since 13), anime, open source psychology and philosophy. I find these topics and ideas really fascinating, inspiring and amazing. I’m currently a student preparing for an entrance. In this blog I plan to share my various opinions and analysis, along with interesting technology stuff. P.S. I love GNU/Linux :)
item.content:
Hello, I’m Arnab Chakraborty. I love programming (and have been programming since 13), anime, open source psychology and philosophy. I find these topics and ideas really fascinating, inspiring and amazing. I’m currently a student preparing for an entrance.

In this blog I plan to share my various opinions and analysis, along with interesting technology stuff.

P.S. I love GNU/Linux :)
